content: loosely inspired by vee from *the owl house* this pattern provides instructions on how to crochet a basilisk-like kerchief to be worn around the head or neck the finished piece measures at a height of about 11 and a base of about 18 plus two 8 ties this can be adjusted according to preference this pattern requires a 4 5mm hook similar sized hooks can be used but may affect the final dimensions you should need no more than 100 yards of olive green yarn for the main colour and small amounts of navy blue for the detailing other notions needed include a yarn needle and scissors please respect and follow the publishing guidelines outlined in the pattern footnotes enjoy
